mapper.insert: insert into db_sfcuser (USERID, OPER, CORPID, EBAYIDENTIFY, OPERFLAG, OPERTIME, ORDERSTATUS, UPDATEFLAG, TOKEN, SHIPPERADDRESS, SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE, APPKEY, SHIPPERNAME, SHIPPEREMAIL, SHIPPERZIPCODE, SHIPPERPHONE, SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME ) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebayidentify,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{token,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shipperaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shipperaddresstype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{appkey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shippername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shipperemail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shipperzipcode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shipperphone,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{shippercompanyname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select USERID, OPER, CORPID, EBAYIDENTIFY, OPERFLAG, OPERTIME, ORDERSTATUS, UPDATEFLAG, TOKEN, SHIPPERADDRESS, SHIPPERADDRESSTYPE, APPKEY, SHIPPERNAME, SHIPPEREMAIL, SHIPPERZIPCODE, SHIPPERPHONE, SHIPPERCOMPANYNAME from db_sfcuser
